title: Prompt AI Website

requirements.text: Create a backend actor with the ability to store and retrieve conversation history (prompt + response pairs) per session, including functions: submitPrompt(text: Text) which stores the prompt and returns a simulated AI-style response, getHistory() which returns all prompt/response pairs in order, and clearHistory() to reset the conversation.
acceptanceCriteria: submitPrompt accepts a text string and returns a Text response
getHistory returns an array of {prompt: Text, response: Text} records
clearHistory resets stored conversation to empty
All state is persisted in stable variables

requirements.text: Build a prompt input interface where the user can type a message into a text area and submit it via a button or Enter key. The input should be cleared after submission and show a loading state while awaiting the backend response.
acceptanceCriteria: Text area is visible and accepts multi-line input
Submit button and Enter key both trigger submission
Input clears after submission
Loading spinner or indicator is shown while waiting for response

requirements.text: Build a conversation display area that renders the full prompt/response history as a chat-style thread. User prompts appear on the right side; AI responses appear on the left side. New messages scroll into view automatically.
acceptanceCriteria: User messages shown right-aligned with distinct styling
AI responses shown left-aligned with distinct styling
Conversation scrolls to the latest message automatically
Empty state message shown when no conversation exists

requirements.text: Add a 'Clear Conversation' button that calls clearHistory() on the backend and resets the displayed conversation thread to empty.
acceptanceCriteria: Button is visible in the UI
Clicking it calls clearHistory on the backend
The conversation display resets to the empty state after clearing

requirements.text: Apply a sleek dark-mode editorial visual theme inspired by the warm monochrome tones, soft gradients, and clean typographic style seen in the uploaded reference images. Use a warm charcoal/dark beige background, off-white text, rose/blush accent colors, and a refined sans-serif typeface. Apply this theme consistently across all UI elements: header, chat bubbles, input area, and buttons.
acceptanceCriteria: Warm dark background color applied globally
Accent color (rose/blush) used for send button and active states
All text uses a refined sans-serif font
Theme is consistent across header, chat area, input, and buttons

requirements.text: Render the generated hero background image (hero-bg.dim_1440x900.png) as a static asset in the app header or page background from frontend/public/assets/generated.
acceptanceCriteria: Image is loaded from /assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1440x900.png
Image displays correctly as a background or header decoration without routing through the backend
